00001 package citation.print;
00002 
00003 import net.rim.device.api.ui.component.Dialog;
00004 import citation.data.Citation;
00005 
00006 import com.zebra.blackberry.comm.BluetoothPrinterConnection;
00007 import com.zebra.blackberry.comm.ZebraPrinterConnection;
00008 import com.zebra.blackberry.comm.ZebraPrinterConnectionException;
00009 
00014 public class Printer {
00015     private String macAddress = "00037A25D18D";
00016     private ZebraPrinterConnection zebraPrinterConnection;
00017 
00018     private byte[] stringToCPCL(String aString) {
00019         String cpclControlSequence = 
00020                         "! 0 200 200 800 1\r\n" 
00021                         + "ON-FEED IGNORE\r\n"
00022                 + "T 0 6 137 177 TEST1\r\n"
00023                 + "T 0 6 137 277 TEST2\r\n"
00024                 + "PRINT\r\n";
00025         return cpclControlSequence.getBytes();
00026     }
00027 
00028     public void connect() throws PrinterException {
00029         try {
00030             if (zebraPrinterConnection != null && zebraPrinterConnection.isConnected() == true)
00031                 return;
00032 
00033             System.out.println("Creating new BluetoothPrinterConnection...");
00034             zebraPrinterConnection = new BluetoothPrinterConnection(macAddress);
00035             Dialog.inform("Calling ZebraPrinterConnection.open()...");
00036             zebraPrinterConnection.open();
00037         } catch (ZebraPrinterConnectionException ex) {
00038             disconnect();
00039             zebraPrinterConnection = null;
00040             throw new PrinterException(ex.getMessage());
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void disconnect() throws PrinterException {
00045         try {
00046             if (zebraPrinterConnection != null)
00047                 zebraPrinterConnection.close();
00048         } catch (ZebraPrinterConnectionException ex) {
00049             throw new PrinterException(ex.getMessage());
00050         } finally {
00051             zebraPrinterConnection = null;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     public void print(Citation aCitation) throws PrinterException {
00056         try {
00057                 System.out.println("Trying to connect via BT...");
00058             connect();
00059             byte[] cpclControlSequence = stringToCPCL("");
00060             System.out.println("Writing byte sequence to printer...");
00061             zebraPrinterConnection.write(cpclControlSequence);
00062             Dialog.inform("Wrote byte sequence to printer...");
00063             Thread.sleep(2000);
00064         } catch (ZebraPrinterConnectionException ex) {
00065             throw new PrinterException(ex.getMessage());
00066         } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
00067             throw new PrinterException(ex.getMessage());
00068         } finally {
00069             disconnect();
00070             System.out.println("Trying to disconnect from BT...");
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
